code: import'../assets/blog.css';import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddBlog=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[decription,setDecription]=useState("");const[auther,setAuther]=useState("");const[image,setImage]=useState(null);const[successMessage,setSuccessMessage]=useState("");const handleImageChange=e=>{setImage(e.target.files[0]);};const blogSubmitData=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData();formData.append("title",title);formData.append("decription",decription);formData.append("auther",auther);if(image){formData.append("image",image);}try{const result=await fetch("http://localhost:8002/api/add-blog",{method:"POST",body:formData});if(result.ok){setSuccessMessage('Your blog has been added successfully!');setTitle("");setDecription("");setAuther("");setImage(null);}else{setSuccessMessage('There was an error adding your blog. Please try again');}}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);setSuccessMessage('An error occurred. Please try again later');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Blog Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:blogSubmitData,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true,placeholder:"Title"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:decription,name:decription,onChange:e=>setDecription(e.target.value),required:true,placeholder:"Decription"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:auther,name:auther,onChange:e=>setAuther(e.target.value),required:true,placeholder:"Auther"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:handleImageChange,accept:"image/*",placeholder:"Image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Create Blog"})]}),successMessage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:successMessage})]});};export default AddBlog;
